name: Roboot Shooters
description:
A simple FPS shooter game where you have to shoot...roboots. What are roboots: Roboots are strangely deformed robots, that have issues, and think that it is funny to attack you for no reason, so you have to defend yourself from these crazy things, and the only thing you have in your gun!

CONTROLS: Mouse to look, click to interact with menus and buttons, E to shoot, R to reload the gun.

OBJECTIVE: Kill as many roboots as you can, and see how many rounds you can survive! 

Sometimes hearts will appear at random in the map, shoot them to regain your health.
